title:
Stability for the $2\frac12$-D compressible viscous non-resistive and
  heat-conducting magnetohydrodynamic flow
authors: Xiaoping Zhai, Yongsheng Li, and Yajuan Zhao
abstract:
In this paper, we are concerned with the initial boundary values problem
associated to the compressible viscous non-resistive and heat-conducting
magnetohydrodynamic flow, where the magnetic field is vertical. More precisely,
by exploiting the intrinsic structure of the system and introducing several new
unknown quantities, we overcome the difficulty stemming from the lack of
dissipation for density and magnetic field, and prove the global well-posedness
of strong solutions in the framework of Soboles spaces $H^3$. In addition, we
also get the exponential decay for this non-resistive system. Different from
the known results [23], [24], [42], we donot need the assumption that the
background magnetic field is positive here.
